sn12.53:1.2: “Samyojaniyesu, bhikkhave, dhammesu assadanupassino viharato tanha pavaddhati.
sn12.53:2.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, telanca paticca vattinca paticca telappadipo jhayeyya.
sn12.53:2.2: Tatra puriso kalena kalam telam asinceyya vattim upasamhareyya.
sn12.53:2.3: Evanhi so, bhikkhave, telappadipo tadaharo tadupadano ciram dighamaddhanam jaleyya.
sn12.53:2.4: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, samyojaniyesu dhammesu assadanupassino viharato tanha pavaddhati.
sn12.53:3.1: Samyojaniyesu, bhikkhave, dhammesu adinavanupassino viharato tanha nirujjhati.
sn12.53:4.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, telanca paticca vattinca paticca telappadipo jhayeyya.
sn12.53:4.2: Tatra puriso na kalena kalam telam asinceyya na vattim upasamhareyya.
sn12.53:4.3: Evanhi so, bhikkhave, telappadipo purimassa ca upadanassa pariyadana annassa ca anupahara anaharo nibbayeyya.
sn12.53:4.4: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, samyojaniyesu dhammesu adinavanupassino viharato tanha nirujjhati.
